org.sbml.jsbml.ext.render.director

Interface SBGNProcessNode<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The concrete data type for a particular implementation of this node.
    All Superinterfaces:
    SBGNNode<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AssociationNode<T>, DissociationNode<T>, OmittedProcessNode<T>, ProcessNode<T>, UncertainProcessNode<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSBGNProcessNode

    public interface SBGNProcessNode<T>
extends SBGNNode<T>
    Interface for all SBGN specified process nodes.

    This interface defines the draw(org.sbml.jsbml.ext.layout.Curve, double, org.sbml.jsbml.ext.layout.Point) methods to draw the process node, it allows to set the line width and to calculate the contact points at the process node.

    Since:
    1.4
    Author:
    Meike Aichele
